content:
**Highest performance impact:**
1. Quality settings (can be changed through settings -> visuals -> texture quality)
2. Terrain (can be disabled through settings -> visuals -> disable terrain -> on)
3. Weather (can be disabled through settings -> visuals -> weather -> off)

**Medium performance impact:**
1. Buildings (can be disabled through settings -> visuals -> disable buildings -> on)
2. Trees (can be disabled through settings -> visuals -> disable trees -> on)
3. Custom frontiers (can be disable through settings -> visuals -> optimize frontiers -> on)

**Low performance impact**
1. Clouds (can be disabled through settings - > visuals -> clouds -> off)
2. Post Processing (can be disabled through settings -> post processing -> off)
3. Disable 3D units (can be disabled through settings -> disable 3D units -> on)
